text: man thanathuru balaporoththuwen wada karana kenek neweyi.

bit, karat, amu miris, arthapal ala, dehi, bonchi, wambatu, karawila aadi elawalu warga kilo 50,000 kata adhika pramanayak ada udasana dambaulla aarthika madhyasthanayata labi thibunu bawa wyaparikayo kiyathi.

kisisethma pramanawath nowana sochcham watup wadiwima sambandhayen wardhanaya wi athi balagathu kamkaru wirodhaya hamuwe, dainika watupa thawath rupiyal 50 kin wadi kirima sandaha rupiyal biliyana 1.2 ka mudalak samagam walata laba dimata aanduwa piyawara gena athi bawa amathi disanayaka pawasa atha.
